blame.description: get information about authors and dates of duplicated blocks from Git

exitCode.description: exit code to use when at least one duplicate code block is detected but threshold is not exceeded

format.description: list of formats for which to detect duplication (default: all); see https://github.com/kucherenko/jscpd/blob/master/supported_formats.md

formatsExts.description: custom mapping from formats to file extensions (default: https://github.com/kucherenko/jscpd/blob/master/packages/tokenizer/src/formats.ts); see https://github.com/kucherenko/jscpd/blob/master/supported_formats.md

ignore.description: glob pattern for files that should be excluded from duplicate detection

ignoreCase.description: ignore case of symbols in code (experimental)

ignorePattern.description: ignore code blocks matching these regular expressions

maxLines.description: maximum size of source file in lines to check for duplication

maxSize.description: maximum size of source file in bytes to check for duplication (e.g.,: 1kb, 1mb, 120kb)

minLines.description: minimum size of code block in lines to check for duplication

minTokens.description: minimum size of code block in tokens to check for duplication

output.description: path to directory for non-console reports

path.description: paths that should be included in duplicate detection (default: [process.cwd()])

pattern.description: glob pattern for files that should be included in duplicate detection (e.g., **/*.txt); only used to filter directories configured via path option

reporters.description: a list of reporters to use to output information about duplication; see https://github.com/kucherenko/jscpd/blob/master/packages/jscpd/README.md#reporters

color.description: badge color (name or RGB code without #, default: green if beneath threshold, red if above threshold, grey if threshold not set); see https://github.com/badgen/badgen/blob/master/src/color-presets.ts

icon.description: URL for icon to display in front of badge subject text (e.g., data:image/svg+xml;base64,...)

iconWidth.description: SVG width of icon to display in front of badge subject text; set this if icon is not square

label.description: badge subject text (URL-encoding needed for spaces or special characters)

labelColor.description: badge label color (name or RGB code without #); see https://github.com/badgen/badgen/blob/master/src/color-presets.ts

path.description: output path for duplication level badge (default: path.join(output, 'jscpd-badge.svg'))

scale.description: size of badge relative to default of 1

status.description: badge value text (URL-encoding needed for spaces or special characters, default: duplication %)

silent.description: do not write duplicate detection progress and result to console

skipLocal.description: skip duplicates within folders; just detect cross-folder duplicates

store.description: store used to collect information about code (default: in-memory store); install @jscpd/leveldb-store and use leveldb for big repositories

threshold.description: maximum allowed duplicate lines expressed as a percentage; exit with error and exit code 1 when threshold exceeded

verbose.description: show full information during duplicate detection
